I attended to the EuroEvoDevo Meeting in Helsinki, Finland this month. The event was fantastic, offering the chance to reconnect with friends and colleagues and make new connections. It was a wonderful opportunity to share the results of my first postdoc project. I presented at the Platynereis Satellite Meeting and the Symposium "Diversity of Sex Determination Mechanisms" during the EuroEvoDevo 2024.
